Nick Chua

Reading List

Reading to me is a window into other worlds. This section will house my current favorite articles, books, podcasts, or newsletters I've read. Yes, I know podcasts don't count as reading, but I think they serve much of the same purpose as reading. These will not encompass all the articles and things I am reading, as the list might be tedious to scroll through. I will send out the full weekly list in my newsletters. Personal reading such as science fiction/fantasy books will be listed on the about me portion of my website.

Articles

Matthew Ball -Nine Reasons Why Disney+ Will Succeed

Apple Infringes on Qualcomm Patent - interesting article, will follow on how it develops

Russia Tests New Facebook Tampering Tactic - Russian agent confesses to attempting to find people in Ukraine that are willing to rent their facebook accounts to spread misinformation.

EU Votes to pass Article 13 - probably one of the dumbest laws I've ever seen passed, the question of how content will be regulated will be interesting to follow... Potential for lots of black hats to be created in my opinion

Benedict Evans -Tesla, software, and disruption

Rendersci -Americans are becoming "Wellthy"

Steve Kaplan -Which CEO Characteristics and Abilities Matter

Books

I've definitely been slacking here as I've only read a few Star Wars books in the last months, so any recommendations would be welcome!
